media_id.description: the business_media row id chosen for this campaign's tile

action_type.description: business action type result for this campaign, currenlty only LEADS is supported

business_language.description: primary campaign language, currently supported either HEBREW, ENGLISH

total_budget.description: total campaign budget in campaign currency, float format number

currency.description: campaign currency, currently suported: either NIS, USD

goal_cpa.description: an optional goal CPA (minimum) that hte client would like to achieve. for FUTURE purpose

max_cpa.description: the maximum CPA (in campaign currency) that the client would like to pay - this is the e.g. CPL that is worth to the client to pay

countries.description: comma delimited list, currently supported: ISRAEL, US

gender.description: either one of MALE, FEMALE, ANY

white_list_emails.description: comma delimited list of emails, will create an audience with name per the campaign, and reference it as white_list_audience_id

add_white_list_emails.description: comma delimited list of emails to add to the white list audience referenced in white_list_audience_id

tags.description: comma delimited list of tags - will replace current campaign tags

add_tags.description: comma delimited list of tags - will be added to current campaign tags

remove_tags.description: comma delimited list of tags - will be deleted from current campaign tags

is_public.description: is this a public campaign open to any influencer to participate

minimum_age.description: minimum age in years for influencers to particiapte

prospect_has_reward.description: do prospects in this campaign have rewards in return for fulfilling a contract

prospect_reward_condition.description: explain the condition for the discount in plain text
